text: aur main tumhaare thaharae hue saajheedaaro se kaise daroon, jabaki tum is baat se nahin darate ki tumane use allaah ka sahabhaagee us cheez ko thaharaaya hai, jisaka usane tumapar koee pramaan avatarit nahin kiya? ab donon fareekon mein se kaun adhik nishchint rahane ka adhikaaree hai? batao yadi tum jaanate ho
